misc: Regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour as well with decent results
biography: Sami, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is set to make his seventh appearance in the upcoming 2025 tournament. Representing Hirsala Golf, Sami is known for his calm demeanor on the course and strategic approach to the game.

While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Sami's consistent presence in the competition speaks to his dedication and passion for the sport. He is a formidable competitor, always analyzing the course and adapting his game plan.

Beyond the Hector Trophée, Sami regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour, achieving commendable results. His commitment to continuous improvement and his unwavering spirit make him a respected figure among his peers.
